mapper.select: select checkin, checkout, roomNum, userIdx, r.hotelCode from roomreserinfo re JOIN roomInfo r ON re.roomCode = r.roomCode JOIN hotelInfo h ON h.hotelCode = r.hotelCode order by r.hotelCode, re.roomCode
select checkIn, checkOut, roomCode, userIdx from roomreserinfo where roomCode=#{roomCode} order by checkIn
